content.text: Match ends, Stoke City 2, Swansea City 2.
Second Half ends, Stoke City 2, Swansea City 2.
Foul by Alberto Paloschi (Swansea City).
Philipp Wollscheid (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Stoke City. Jakob Haugaard tries a through ball, but Joselu is caught offside.
Foul by Alberto Paloschi (Swansea City).
Philipp Wollscheid (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Joselu (Stoke City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Philipp Wollscheid (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alberto Paloschi (Swansea City).
Attempt missed. Jefferson Montero (Swansea City) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Gylfi Sigurdsson.
Attempt missed. Ibrahim Afellay (Stoke City) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high.
Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Stephen Ireland.
Giannelli Imbula (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alberto Paloschi (Swansea City).
Corner,  Stoke City. Conceded by Jefferson Montero.
Attempt missed. Joselu (Stoke City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Marko Arnautovic with a cross.
Erik Pieters (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Wayne Routledge (Swansea City).

Foul by Leroy Fer (Swansea City).
Ibrahim Afellay (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Swansea City. Neil Taylor replaces Kyle Naughton because of an injury.
Substitution, Stoke City. Stephen Ireland replaces Glenn Whelan.
Goal!  Stoke City 2, Swansea City 2. Alberto Paloschi (Swansea City) right footed shot from outside the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Ashley Williams.
Attempt blocked. Alberto Paloschi (Swansea City) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Ashley Williams.
Angel Rangel (Swansea City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Marko Arnautovic (Stoke City).
Substitution, Stoke City. Mame Biram Diouf replaces Bojan.
Substitution, Swansea City. Alberto Paloschi replaces Bafétimbi Gomis.
Offside, Stoke City. Bojan tries a through ball, but Marko Arnautovic is caught offside.
Goal!  Stoke City 2, Swansea City 1. Gylfi Sigurdsson (Swansea City) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Wayne Routledge.
Giannelli Imbula (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Substitution, Swansea City. Jefferson Montero replaces Leon Britton.

Goal!  Stoke City 2, Swansea City 0. Bojan (Stoke City) left footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Glenn Whelan.
Offside, Swansea City. Gylfi Sigurdsson tries a through ball, but Bafétimbi Gomis is caught offside.
